extDesc.message: Convert Register articles to UK spelling.

div_explanation.message: An extension for Google Chrome that allows you to replace words with US spellings in The Register articles with UK spellings.

li1.message: Pin the extension so it's always visible.

li2.message: Read The Register as you normally would.

li3.message: Click on the extension icon in the toolbar.

li4.message: All US spellings in the built-in database will be replaced with UK spellings.

li5.message: It may make things confusing because it doesn't consider word context.

li6.message: For example, it will replace "check" with "cheque" even when UK English would also call for "check."

li7.message: The extension badge will show the number of words replaced, if any.

li8.message: Reloading the page will undo any changes.

button_close_msg.message: Ok, I get it. Close the window.
